name: Armor Havok
description:
My entry for Mech Jam 3 !

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Bit of story :

In an industrial facility on a distant planet, you play as a bunch of rag tag pilots that respec - ed some work mechs for combat to defend themselves from a corporate  mercenary invasion force.

Choose your pilot and loadout, and get ready to wreck havok !

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Gameplay and controls : Movement keys :

WASD or ZSQD or Arrowkeys = to move around and select stuff in menus

Jump key :

Space bar to jump and confirm selection in menus

Shoot key :

Aim with the mouse

Left click shoots primary 

Right click shoots secondary, if the current weapon has a sec function.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Credits :

All code and assets done solo during the jam's time

External sources :

Mech jam's logo , Genny Vst for LMMS, Orbitron font from Google fonts

Programs used :

Godot engine, Blender, Gimp, LMMS

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

That's about it for now :p 

i hope you'll have fun and enjoy the game :)
